Configuring / Setting up the Quadient Inspire Connect feature / Setting up step templates to send jobs to Quadient Inspire Designer
Setting up step templates to send jobs to Quadient Inspire Designer
Copy and customize the ComposeAFP and ComposePDF to send jobs to Quadient Inspire Designer for processing.
To set up a step template to send jobs to Quadient Inspire Designer:
1. Click the Workflow tab.
2. In the left pane, click Step Templates.
3. Right-click the ComposeAFP or ComposePDF step template and select Copy.
4. On the Copy page, review and update these fields:
Data files
Data modules
Fixed data files
Fixed data modules
Quadient JOB file
External command
WFD file
5. Click OK.
Parent topic: Setting up the Quadient Inspire Connect feature
